mesquite.lib

Interface TreeContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context, Listable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTreeWindowMaker, DepContTreeWindow, ObedientTreeWindow, SimpleTreeWindowMaker

    public interface TreeContext
extends Context, Listable
    An interface to be used by modules etc. so that employees can find the current tree in their context.
